New Records: Finn Allen scored 137 runs from 62 balls, hitting 5 fours and 16 sixes during the match.
Haris Rauf conceded 27 runs in one over, including two sixes and a single.
Key Match Events: Finn Allen hit 27 runs in one over, including two sixes and a single.
New Zealand won the match by 45 runs, securing their third consecutive victory in the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The video of Finn Allen hitting 27 runs in one over went viral on the internet.
The match was played at the University Oval in Dunedin.
